titles: Articles deuisid by the holle consent of the kynges moste honourable counsayle, his gracis licence opteined therto, not only to exhorte, but also to enfourme his louynge subiectis of the trouthe
author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
notes: A justification of Henry VIII's divorce from Catherine of Aragon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Henry --  VIII, --  King of England, 1491-1547 --  Divorce from Catherine --  Early works to 1800.
